mapper.select: select t.*, (select count(1) from JY_SCM_PUR_ORDERSPLIT where orderDetailId =t.id and status='0') as mateNum, (select count(1) from JY_SCM_PUR_ORDERSPLIT where orderDetailId =t.id and status='1') as okNum from JY_SCM_PUR_ORDERDETAIL t where t.id = #{id}

select t.*, (select count(1) from JY_SCM_PUR_ORDERSPLIT where orderDetailId =t.id and status='0') as mateNum, (select count(1) from JY_SCM_PUR_ORDERSPLIT where orderDetailId =t.id and status='1') as okNum, t.id as orderDetailId from JY_SCM_PUR_ORDERDETAIL t where 1=1
and t.orderId=#{param.orderId}

select t.*, (select count(1) from JY_SCM_PUR_ORDERSPLIT where orderDetailId = t.id and status = '0') as mateNum,
(select count(1) from JY_SCM_PUR_ORDERSPLIT where orderDetailId = t.id and status = '1') as okNum, (select jbf.name from jy_base_franchisee jbf where jbf.id =t.franchiseeId) as franchiseeName, (select jsm.suppmoucode from jy_scm_moudledetail jsm where jsm.id =t.mdtlCode) as mdtlCodeName, (select count(1) from jy_scm_ims_product p inner join jy_scm_moudle m on m.code=p.moucode where m.id=t.mdCode and p.status='B' and p.orgId in (select o.id from jy_base_org o where o.companyid=#{orgId} and o.orggrade != '4')) as stockNum, t.id as orderDetailId from JY_SCM_PUR_ORDERDETAIL t left join jy_scm_moudle m on m.id=t.mdcode where t.orderId in(SELECT jspo.id FROM JY_SCM_PUR_ORDER jspo start with jspo.id=#{orderId} connect by prior jspo.id = jspo.pid)

select t.*, (select count(1) from JY_SCM_PUR_ORDERSPLIT where orderDetailId = t.id and status = '0') as mateNum, (select case when p.feetype = '1' then (select sum(mi.availweight) from JY_SCM_IMS_MATERIALIN mi where p.code = mi.code and mi.orgid in (select o.id from jy_base_org o where o.companyid = #{orgId} and o.orggrade != '4')) else (select sum(mi.availweight) from JY_SCM_IMS_MATERIALIN mi where p.code = mi.code and mi.orgid in (select o.id from jy_base_org o where o.companyid = #{orgId} and o.orggrade != '4')) end numbers from JY_SCM_IMS_MATERIAL p inner join jy_scm_moudle m on m.code = p.moudlecode where m.id = t.mdcode) stockNum, (select count(1) from JY_SCM_PUR_ORDERSPLIT where orderDetailId = t.id and status = '1') as okNum, (select jbf.name from jy_base_franchisee jbf where jbf.id = t.franchiseeId) as franchiseeName, (select jsm.suppmoucode from jy_scm_moudledetail jsm where jsm.id = t.mdtlCode) as mdtlCodeName,
t.id as orderDetailId from JY_SCM_PUR_ORDERDETAIL t left join jy_scm_moudle m on m.id = t.mdcode where t.orderId in(SELECT jspo.id FROM JY_SCM_PUR_ORDER jspo start with jspo.id=#{orderId} connect by prior jspo.id = jspo.pid)
select t.* from JY_SCM_PUR_ORDERDETAIL t where t.orderId=#{orderId}
mapper.insert: insert into JY_SCM_PUR_ORDERDETAIL (id, orderId, mdCode, gMaterial, gWeight, dWeight, dClarity, dColor, weight, numbers, feeType, basicCost, additionCost, otherCost, unitprice, totalFee, status, circel, cut, description ) values (#{id}, #{orderId}, #{mdCode}, #{gMaterial}, #{gWeight}, #{dWeight}, #{dClarity}, #{dColor}, #{weight}, #{numbers}, #{feeType}, #{basicCost}, #{additionCost}, #{otherCost}, #{unitprice}, #{totalFee}, #{status}, #{circel}, #{cut}, #{description} )
mapper.update: update JY_SCM_PUR_ORDERDETAIL set gMaterial = #{gMaterial}, gWeight = #{gWeight}, dWeight = #{dWeight}, dClarity = #{dClarity}, dColor = #{dColor}, weight = #{weight}, numbers = #{numbers}, feeType = #{feeType}, basicCost = #{basicCost}, additionCost = #{additionCost}, otherCost = #{otherCost}, unitprice = #{unitprice}, totalFee = #{totalFee}, status = #{status}, circel = #{circel}, cut = #{cut}, description = #{description} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select t.*, (select count(1) from JY_SCM_PUR_ORDERSPLIT where orderDetailId =t.id and status='0') as mateNum, (select count(1) from JY_SCM_PUR_ORDERSPLIT where orderDetailId =t.id and status='1') as okNum from JY_SCM_PUR_ORDERDETAIL t WHERE id in
#{item.id}

insert.foreach: insert into JY_SCM_PUR_ORDERDETAIL (id, orderId, mdCode, gMaterial,gWeight, dWeight, dClarity, dColor,weight,numbers,feeType,basicCost,additionCost, otherCost, unitprice,totalFee, description,status,franchiseeId,mdtlCode,circel,cut,beforeId) values (#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.mdCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.gMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.gWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.dClarity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.dColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.numbers,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.feeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.basicCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{item.additionCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{item.otherCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.unitprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.totalFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.franchiseeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.mdtlCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.circel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.cut,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.beforeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update.foreach: update JY_SCM_PUR_ORDERDETAIL set mdCode= #{item.mdCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gMaterial = #{item.gMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gWeight = #{item.gWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dWeight = #{item.dWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dClarity = #{item.dClarity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dColor = #{item.dColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weight = #{item.weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, numbers = #{item.numbers,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, feeType = #{item.feeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, basicCost = #{item.basicCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, additionCost = #{item.additionCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, otherCost = #{item.otherCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, unitprice = #{item.unitprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, totalFee = #{item.totalFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{item.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, franchiseeId = #{item.franchiseeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mdtlCode = #{item.mdtlCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, beforeId = #{item.beforeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, circel = #{item.circel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cut = #{item.cut,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{item.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{item.id}

mapper.select: select od.mdcode, sum(od.numbers) as numbers, sum(od.q) as lackNum from (select t.mdcode,numbers, (select count(1) from jy_scm_pur_ordersplit t1 where t1.orderdetailid = t.id) as q from jy_scm_pur_orderdetail t where t.orderid in (select id from jy_scm_pur_order o where o.ordertype = '0')) od group by od.mdcode
select od.mdcode, sum(numbers) as numbers from jy_scm_pur_orderdetail od where od.orderid in (select id from jy_scm_pur_order o where o.ordertype = '1') group by od.mdcode

select count(1) from jy_scm_pur_orderdetail where status!=1 and id in
#{item.beforeId}

select t.id, (select di.name from jy_data_dict_item di where di.dictid = (select id from jy_data_dict where datakey = 'SCM_PRO_GOLD_TYPE') and di.value = t.gMaterial) as gMaterial, (select di.name from jy_data_dict_item di where di.dictid = (select id from jy_data_dict where datakey = 'SCM_ATTR_GOLDWEIGHT') and di.value = t.gWeight) as gWeight, (select di.name from jy_data_dict_item di where di.dictid = (select id from jy_data_dict where datakey = 'stoneSize') and di.value = t.dWeight) as dWeight, t.dClarity, t.dColor, t.numbers, t.circel, t.cut, t.basiccost, t.additioncost, t.othercost, t.mdCode, t.mdtlCode, t.description, m.code as mdCodeName, (select jbf.name from jy_base_franchisee jbf where jbf.id = t.franchiseeId) as franchiseeName, (select jsm.suppmoucode from jy_scm_moudledetail jsm where jsm.id = t.mdtlCode) as mdtlCodeName from JY_SCM_PUR_ORDERDETAIL t inner join jy_scm_moudle m on t.mdcode = m.id where t.orderId=#{orderId}
